 Formula-building rule for existential quantifier (deduction rule). (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.)
statement:
albidv.1 $e |- ( ph -> ( ps <-> ch ) ) $.
exbidv $p |- ( ph -> ( E. x ps <-> E. x ch ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
